title: WHIG Coordinates Fabricated Intelligence Briefings for Congressional Leaders
description: WHIG coordinates with CIA and Pentagon to provide congressional leaders with intelligence briefings containing systematically fabricated claims about Iraqi WMD capabilities and Al-Qaeda connections. The briefings deliberately omit all contradictory intelligence and dissenting analysis from the intelligence community.
significance: Systematic deception of Congress undermines constitutional separation of powers and prevents informed legislative decision-making on matters of war and national security.
